articles.title: 'The Mandalorian' showrunner says it's ok to call Grogu Baby Yoda - NME
articles.description: Jon Favreau has said fans of 'The Mandalorian' are allowed to call Baby Yoda by his nickname, even after his 'real' name was confirmed.
articles.content:
The Mandalorian creator Jon Favreau has said fans are allowed to call the show’s viral star Baby Yoda by his nickname, even after his ‘real’ name was confirmed.
